original: ENBERG, Bengt Eric Christer, Fil kand, Bromölla, f Sthlm 9/3 04 av l :e ing J C E o sekr i Sv Vanföreanst Centralkté Greta Lilje-blad, gm Ulla-Brita Bergman. Abiturientex v Oberrealschule zum Dom, Lubeck, 25, lantm.-sk 26, fil kand Upps 33. Aman Ultuna lantbr.-högsk 34 — 35, forskn.ass Skånska Cement AB 35—37, laboratoriech AB Iföverken 37—44, chef f Tegelindustriens Centrallaboratorium v IVA sed. 44. Komm.flm 42 — 44. Resor: Tyskl 19— 25, 38, delt int cementkongr Sthlm 38. Av trycket: Mindre upps i geologi o keramik. Sv Tekn.frn, kontaktman i Forskningens beredskapsorg sed. 39. Hobbies : Cykelturer, segling.
translated: ENBERG, Bengt Eric Christer, Bachelor of Arts, Bromölla, born in Stockholm on 9/3 04, son of civil engineer J C E and secretary at the Swedish Handicapped Central Committee Greta Liljeblad, married to Ulla-Brita Bergman. Graduated from Oberrealschule zum Dom, Lubeck in 1925, studied agriculture at Lantmästare school in 1926, obtained Bachelor of Arts degree from Uppsala University in 1933. Assistant at Ultuna Agricultural College from 1934 to 1935, research assistant at Skånska Cement AB from 1935 to 1937, laboratory chief at AB Iföverken from 1937 to 1944, chief of the Central Laboratory for the Brick Industry at the Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences since 1944. Municipal commissioner from 1942 to 1944. Travels: Germany in 1919-1925 and 1938, participated in the International Cement Congress in Stockholm in 1938. Published several minor papers in geology and ceramics. Member of the Swedish Technical Society, contact person in the Research Preparedness Organization since 1939. Hobbies: Cycling, sailing.
